name: vue-layout-components
description: Layout with small icons style sidebar and some other components.
author: Adrijan Mitrov

scripts.build: npm run build:unpkg & npm run build:es & npm run build:umd & npm run build:cjs & npm run compile-styles & npm run css-minify
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format cjs --file dist/main.js
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format umd --file dist/main.umd.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format es --file dist/main.esm.js
scripts.build:unpkg: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format iife --file dist/main.min.js
scripts.compile-styles: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/index.scss dist/vue-layout-components.css
